description: Manage Azure Network Virtual Appliance Inbound Security Rules.

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance inbound-security-rule create
commands.summary: Create the specified Network Virtual Appliance Inbound Security Rules.
commands.syntax:
az network virtual-appliance inbound-security-rule create --name
                                                          --nva-name
                                                          --resource-group
                                                          [--id]
                                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                          [--rule-type {AutoExpire, Permanent}]
                                                          [--rules]

commands.name: az network virtual-appliance inbound-security-rule show
commands.summary: Get the available specified Network Virtual Appliance Inbound Security Rules Collection.
